an4.105:4.1: * “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, ambāni.
an4.105:4.3: Āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇi, pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇi, āmaṃ āmavaṇṇi, pakkaṃ pakkavaṇṇi—
an4.105:4.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ambūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.105:4.7: Āmo pakkavaṇṇī, pakko āmavaṇṇī, āmo āmavaṇṇī, pakko pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti pakkavaṇṇī?
an4.105:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:5.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.105:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:5.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ āmaṃ pakkavaṇṇi;
an4.105:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti āmavaṇṇī?
an4.105:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:6.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.105:6.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti āmavaṇṇī.
an4.105:6.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ pakkaṃ āmavaṇṇi;
an4.105:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti āmavaṇṇī?
an4.105:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:7.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.105:7.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āmo hoti āmavaṇṇī.
an4.105:7.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ āmaṃ āmavaṇṇi;
an4.105:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavaṇṇī?
an4.105:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pāsādikaṃ hoti abhikkantaṃ paṭikkantaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritaṃ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ.
an4.105:8.3: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.105:8.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavaṇṇī.
an4.105:8.5: Seyyathāpi taṃ, bhikkhave, ambaṃ pakkaṃ pakkavaṇṇi;
an4.105:8.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro ambūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
